mission: To empower sales teams with intelligent automation.
product_description: An AI-powered cold calling assistant that handles initial outreach and schedules qualified meetings.
value_proposition: AutoCaller X saves your sales team hundreds of hours by filtering leads and booking appointments, allowing them to focus on closing deals.
target_audience: B2B sales teams in tech companies, SMBs looking to scale their sales efforts.
key_selling_points: Seamlessly integrates with your existing CRM (planned feature).
conversation_goal: To determine if the lead is a good fit for our product and to schedule a 15-minute discovery call with a senior sales representative if there's interest.
